about_the_game:
In NebuLeet, you lead a space mercenaries group following your own agenda. Fight in space and on planets, participate in a living economy, dabble in politics - whatever brings you closer to victory.

[code]Please note: this game is in active development. The trailer and screenshots don't reflect the final product yet.

[/code]

NebuLeet features a two-layered combat system. On the surface: the simplicity of an auto-battler. Deeper down: a complex, programmable combat environment. The victory isn't just about having the best weapons - strategic algorithms can turn the tide even against superior technology.

Prefer more RPG-style gameplay? It's possible to have manual control over the flagship in battles. This game is inspired by Space Rangers, after all.

Every vessel is uniquely yours. Assemble each unit from individual parts, each with its own stats and mechanics. The look of your starship isn't just for show; if it looks like a death machine, it probably is.

Explore and exploit an entire star system.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or above (should work on most distros)
  • Processor: Any processor with 2-4 cores, e.g. Intel gen6-7 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics will do
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or above (should work on most distros)
  • Processor: A processor with 4 cores, e.g. Intel gen8-9 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics will do
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
